skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the flagship of the Vichya's First Cruiser Fleet, Alg¨¦rie of the Templar Knights. In my history as a ship... I was called the best-designed treaty cruiser. Accordingly, I've been through plenty of interesting escapades... Hehehe. How do you feel about me, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Bonjour. From today, this heavy cruiser of the Vichya Dominion shall now be serving at this port. It's a pleasure to meet you, hehe. If it's not too much to ask, I hope that we can get along well.
skins.login: We're on great terms after all. I would've been fine waiting a bit longer.
skins.details: When it comes to history, relying on second-hand accounts is not enough to sift fact from fiction. You must conduct your own research.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even if I don¡¯t have any honors or decorations, my strength can speak for itself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh, Commander. How about enjoying some wine with me later? Hehe, only after you finish up the rest of your work though, alright?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gold...? Oh, were you interested in that story? Hehehe. At that time, the Iris were...
skins.secretaryIdle4: My hobby is touring cat caf¨¦s, but this port doesn't... Oh, that's right. Even at this port, there are plenty of adorable creatures... Yes, how lovely!
skins.secretaryIdle5: The Royal Navy are now allies who fight together with us. Furthermore... even yesterday's enemies are today's allies. What an interesting life this has been... Hehehe.
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh my, did you want to slack off for a bit? Hehe, I won't tell anyone else, so take some time off, okay?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander~? No matter how nice the other person may be, you shouldn't get too carried away. Hehe.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Are you trying to see if I have a fever...?

skins.shipDescription: Oh my, hehe... Are you enjoying the warmth of the sunlight here? I'm glad that you're finding some time to relax here, but wouldn't you rather come play with everyone else?
skins.acquisition: Oh my, hehe... Are you enjoying the warmth of the sunlight here? I'm glad that you're finding some time to relax here, but wouldn't you rather come play with everyone else?
skins.login: Even if you've already applied some sunscreen, you still need to take care to not get sunburns.
skins.details: Hehehe. Commander, it seemed like you enjoyed being surrounded by so many cute girls. Who caught your attention the most?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Here, a sun cap. If you want to play out on the beach, please make the proper preparations against the sun's rays first.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A beach volleyball match between the Vichya and Royal Navy... Sounds fun. How about watching it together?
skins.secretaryIdle4: Writing words on the beach and waiting for the waves to wash them away... Hehe, seems like it'd be fun~ What shall we write?
skins.secretaryIdle5: Sigh... It's seriously quite hot... Commander, don't push yourself, you hear? Please let me know if you start to feel worse.
skins.secretaryTouch: You want some coconut juice...? Alright, wait there for now. I'll bring some over.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Huh?! I wonder, do these clothes make the Commander more impertinent...?
